titleStmt.title: Regulated zeal. Or, an earnest request to all zealously affected Christians, to seeke the desired reformation in a peaceable way. Shewing further, in severall particulars, wherein they are offensive who disturb the peace of the church By. W. T.
titleStmt.author: W. T. (William Thomason)

notesStmt.note: On the Thomason copy, the author's statement, "By. W. T.", has the annotation, "homanson", added in MS.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
